title: My First Day at Junior High

sentences.english: Today is my first day at junior high.
sentences.chinese: 今天是我上初中的第一天。

sentences.english: I am ready!
sentences.chinese: 我准备好了！

sentences.english: I put on my school uniform and red scarf.
sentences.chinese: 我穿上校服，戴上红领巾。

sentences.english: I pack my bag with my textbook, eraser, and T-shirt.
sentences.chinese: 我包里装了教科书、橡皮和T恤。

sentences.english: My grey jacket is there too.
sentences.chinese: 我的灰色夹克也在里面。

sentences.english: I am a bit nervous, but I want to make new friends.
sentences.chinese: 我有点紧张，但我想交新朋友。

sentences.english: In the teaching building, I meet everyone in my class.
sentences.chinese: 在教学楼里，我见到了班里的每个人。

sentences.english: They are all very nice.
sentences.chinese: 他们都很好。

sentences.english: We introduce ourselves to each other.
sentences.chinese: 我们互相介绍自己。

sentences.english: "Hi! My name is Tom. What is your hobby?" asks a boy with a smile.
sentences.chinese: "嗨！我叫汤姆。你的爱好是什么？"一个微笑着的男孩问。

sentences.english: "I like reading and exploring," I say.
sentences.chinese: "我喜欢读书和探索,"我说。

sentences.english: "What about you?"
sentences.chinese: "你呢？"

sentences.english: "I enjoy geography, biology, and history," he answers.
sentences.chinese: "我喜欢地理、生物和历史,"他回答。

sentences.english: "They are fun subjects!"
sentences.chinese: "这些科目都很有趣！"

sentences.english: Our teacher is very polite.
sentences.chinese: 我们的老师非常有礼貌。

sentences.english: She tells us not to be nervous.
sentences.chinese: 她告诉我们不要紧张。

sentences.english: "Of course you will do well," she says with a big smile.
sentences.chinese: "你们当然会做得很好的,"她带着灿烂的笑容说。

sentences.english: At lunch time, we go to the dining hall together.
sentences.chinese: 午饭时间，我们一起去食堂。

sentences.english: We eat and talk about our families.
sentences.chinese: 我们边吃边聊家人。

sentences.english: Then we have a lab class.
sentences.chinese: 然后我们上了实验课。

sentences.english: It is so interesting!
sentences.chinese: 太有趣了！

sentences.english: We start to explore science together.
sentences.chinese: 我们一起开始探索科学。

sentences.english: Some students join the music team.
sentences.chinese: 有些学生加入了音乐队。

sentences.english: Others take part in sports.
sentences.chinese: 有些参加了运动。

sentences.english: I think I will join both!
sentences.chinese: 我想两个都参加！

sentences.english: This school is great.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校太棒了。

sentences.english: After school, I say goodbye to my new friends.
sentences.chinese: 放学后，我和新朋友说再见。

sentences.english: I will never forget this day.
sentences.chinese: 我永远不会忘记这一天。

sentences.english: It is the start of a wonderful journey!
sentences.chinese: 这是一段美好旅程的开始！
